## Create a GitHub account {#sec-GitHub-account-creation}

**GitHub** is a cloud-based hosting platform that lets you host and manage repositories for version control and collaboration.

![](images/paste-15A58C67.png){width="250"}

To Create a GitHub account, follow the instructions that are given in slide 3 of the Powerpoint document available at the following [link](https://drive.switch.ch/index.php/s/1eFnksrX0UtjfZV).

## Install GitHub desktop {#sec-GitHub-Desktop-installation}

**GitHub Desktop** is an application that allows to interact with GitHub through a graphical interface instead of using the command line (for software developers) or GitHubâ€™s web browser.

![](images/paste-9238B1AB.png){width="250"}

You can install GitHub Desktop on supported Windows or macOS operating systems.

::: panel-tabset
### Step 1

1.  Visit the [download page](https://desktop.github.com/) for GitHub Desktop.
2.  Click Download for Windows.

![](images/paste-465BAC3C.png)

### Step 2

1.  In your computer's Downloads folder, double-click the GitHub Desktop setup file.
2.  Follow the instruction in the installation wizard to complete the installation.

### Step 3

To connect your GitHub account to GitHub Desktop, follow the instructions that are given in slides 6 to 9 of the Powerpoint document available at the following [link](https://drive.switch.ch/index.php/s/1eFnksrX0UtjfZV).
:::
